verses.verse: וַיְצַ֞ו <S%H6680><s%> vay-Tzav And he commanded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher as much as עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and בֵּיתוֹ֮ <S%H1004><s%> bei-To the steward of his house לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying מַלֵּ֞א <S%H4390><s%> mal-Le Fill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַמְתְּחֹ֤ת <S%H572><s%> 'am-te-Chot sacks הָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <S%H376><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim every man's אֹ֔כֶל <S%H400><s%> 'O-chel, [with] food כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher as they יוּכְל֖וּן <S%H3201><s%> yu-che-Lun they can שְׂאֵ֑ת <S%H5375><s%> se-'Et; carry וְשִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> ve-Sim and put כֶּֽסֶף־ <S%H3701><s%> ke-sef- money אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish each בְּפִ֥י <S%H6310><s%> be-Fi mouth אַמְתַּחְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H572><s%> am-tach-To. in his sack's

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et גְּבִיעִ֞י <S%H1375><s%> ge-vi-'I my cup גְּבִ֣יעַ <S%H1375><s%> ge-Vi-a' cup הַכֶּ֗סֶף <S%H3701><s%> hak-Ke-sef, the silver תָּשִׂים֙ <S%H7760><s%> ta-Sim And put בְּפִי֙ <S%H6310><s%> be-Fi mouth אַמְתַּ֣חַת <S%H572><s%> 'am-Ta-chat in the sack's הַקָּטֹ֔ן <S%H6996><s%> hak-ka-Ton, of the youngest וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ke-sef money שִׁבְר֑וֹ <S%H7668><s%> shiv-Ro; and his corn וַיַּ֕עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as And he did כִּדְבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> kid-Var according to the word יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef that Joseph אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after דִּבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber. had spoken

הַבֹּ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> hab-Bo-ker As soon as the morning א֑וֹר <S%H216><s%> or; light וְהָאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <S%H582><s%> ve-ha-'a-na-Shim the men שֻׁלְּח֔וּ <S%H7971><s%> shul-le-Chu, were sent away הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah with וַחֲמֹרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H2543><s%> va-cha-mo-rei-Hem. they and their asses

הֵ֠ם <S%H1992><s%> hem They יָֽצְא֣וּ <S%H3318><s%> ya-tze-'U [And] when they were gone out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעִיר֮ <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir of the city לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo were not הִרְחִיקוּ֒ <S%H7368><s%> hir-chi-Ku [and] not [yet] far off וְיוֹסֵ֤ף <S%H3130><s%> ve-yo-Sef Joseph אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar said לַֽאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> la-'a-Sher after עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- unto בֵּית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> bei-To, unto his steward ק֥וּם <S%H6965><s%> kum Up רְדֹ֖ף <S%H7291><s%> re-Dof follow אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H376><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim; the men וְהִשַּׂגְתָּם֙ <S%H5381><s%> ve-his-sag-Tam and when thou dost overtake וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta them say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem, to לָ֛מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah Why שִׁלַּמְתֶּ֥ם <S%H7999><s%> shil-lam-Tem unto them Wherefore have ye rewarded רָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah evil תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat Thahash טוֹבָֽה׃ <S%H2896><s%> to-Vah. good

הֲל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo is not זֶ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> Zeh, this אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יִשְׁתֶּ֤ה <S%H8354><s%> yish-Teh drinketh אֲדֹנִי֙ <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Ni [Is] not this [it] in which my lord בּ֔וֹ bo, וְה֕וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu he נַחֵ֥שׁ <S%H5172><s%> na-Chesh and whereby indeed יְנַחֵ֖שׁ <S%H5172><s%> ye-na-Chesh he divineth בּ֑וֹ bo; הֲרֵעֹתֶ֖ם <S%H7489><s%> ha-re-'o-Tem ;ye have done evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עֲשִׂיתֶֽם׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-si-Tem. in so doing

וַֽיַּשִּׂגֵ֑ם <S%H5381><s%> vai-yas-si-Gem; And he overtook וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber them and he spake אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem, about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim words הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh. unto them these same

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru And they said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to him לָ֚מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah Why יְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-Ber unto him Wherefore saith אֲדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Ni, my lord כַּדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> kad-de-va-Rim according to this thing הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh; another חָלִ֙ילָה֙ <S%H2486><s%> cha-Li-lah be far לַעֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <S%H5650><s%> la-'a-va-Dei-cha, that thy servants מֵעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> me-'a-Sot should do כַּדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> kad-da-Var A thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. such

הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> hen Behold כֶּ֗סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ke-sef, Behold the money אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which מָצָ֙אנוּ֙ <S%H4672><s%> ma-Tza-nu which we found בְּפִ֣י <S%H6310><s%> be-Fi mouths אַמְתְּחֹתֵ֔ינוּ <S%H572><s%> 'am-te-cho-Tei-nu, in our sacks' הֱשִׁיבֹ֥נוּ <S%H7725><s%> he-shi-Vo-nu we brought again אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha to you מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz unto thee out of the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an; of Canaan וְאֵ֗יךְ <S%H349><s%> ve-'Eich, How נִגְנֹב֙ <S%H1589><s%> nig-No how then should we steal מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> mib-Beit house אֲדֹנֶ֔יךָ <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Nei-cha, out of thy lord's כֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ke-sef silver א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or זָהָֽב׃ <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav. gold

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whomever יִמָּצֵ֥א <S%H4672><s%> yim-ma-Tze it be found אִתּ֛וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To for מֵעֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <S%H5650><s%> me-'a-va-Dei-cha With whomsoever of thy servants וָמֵ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> va-Met; both let him die וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-gam- also אֲנַ֕חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Nach-nu ourselves נִֽהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> nih-Yeh become לַֽאדֹנִ֖י <S%H113><s%> la-do-Ni and we also will be my lord's לַעֲבָדִֽים׃ <S%H5650><s%> la-'a-va-Dim. bondmen

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- also עַתָּ֥ה <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah Now כְדִבְרֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1697><s%> che-div-rei-Chem to your words כֶּן־ <S%H3651><s%> ken- after that ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu; he אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom יִמָּצֵ֤א <S%H4672><s%> yim-ma-Tze he with whom it is found אִתּוֹ֙ <S%H854><s%> it-To for יִהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> yih-yeh- become לִּ֣י li עָ֔בֶד <S%H5650><s%> 'A-ved, shall be my servant וְאַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tem you תִּהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yu become נְקִיִּֽם׃ <S%H5355><s%> ne-ki-Yim. and ye shall be blameless

וַֽיְמַהֲר֗וּ <S%H4116><s%> vay-ma-ha-Ru, Then they speedily וַיּוֹרִ֛דוּ <S%H3381><s%> vai-yo-Ri-du took down אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַמְתַּחְתּ֖וֹ <S%H572><s%> am-tach-To his sack אָ֑רְצָה <S%H776><s%> 'A-re-tzah; to the ground וַֽיִּפְתְּח֖וּ <S%H6605><s%> vai-yif-te-Chu and opened אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man אַמְתַּחְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H572><s%> am-tach-To. his sack

וַיְחַפֵּ֕שׂ <S%H2664><s%> vay-chap-Pes And he searched בַּגָּד֣וֹל <S%H1419><s%> bag-ga-Dol at the eldest הֵחֵ֔ל <S%H2490><s%> he-Chel, [and] began וּבַקָּטֹ֖ן <S%H6996><s%> u-vak-ka-Ton at the youngest כִּלָּ֑ה <S%H3615><s%> kil-Lah; and left וַיִּמָּצֵא֙ <S%H4672><s%> vai-yim-ma-Tze was found הַגָּבִ֔יעַ <S%H1375><s%> hag-ga-Vi-a', and the cup בְּאַמְתַּ֖חַת <S%H572><s%> be-'am-Ta-chat sack בִּנְיָמִֽן׃ <S%H1144><s%> bin-ya-Min. in Benjamin's

וַֽיִּקְרְע֖וּ <S%H7167><s%> vai-yik-re-'U Then they rent שִׂמְלֹתָ֑ם <S%H8071><s%> sim-lo-Tam; their clothes וַֽיַּעֲמֹס֙ <S%H6006><s%> vai-ya-'a-Mos and laded אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and חֲמֹר֔וֹ <S%H2543><s%> cha-mo-Ro, his ass וַיָּשֻׁ֖בוּ <S%H7725><s%> vai-ya-Shu-vu and returned הָעִֽירָה׃ <S%H5892><s%> ha-'I-rah. to the city

וַיָּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo came יְהוּדָ֤ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah And Judah וְאֶחָיו֙ <S%H251><s%> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren בֵּ֣יתָה <S%H1004><s%> Bei-tah house יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef, to Joseph's וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu he עוֹדֶ֣נּוּ <S%H5750><s%> o-Den-nu was still שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham; there וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> vai-yip-pe-Lu for he [was] yet there and they fell לְפָנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav before him אָֽרְצָה׃ <S%H776><s%> 'A-re-tzah. on the ground

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said לָהֶם֙ la-Hem יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef, And Joseph מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What הַמַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> ham-ma-'a-Seh unto them What deed הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh is this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עֲשִׂיתֶ֑ם <S%H6213><s%> 'a-si-Tem; [is] this that ye have done הֲל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not יְדַעְתֶּ֔ם <S%H3045><s%> ye-da'-Tem, ;wot ye כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- can נַחֵ֧שׁ <S%H5172><s%> na-Chesh as I can certainly יְנַחֵ֛שׁ <S%H5172><s%> ye-na-Chesh divine אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish not that such a man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that כָּמֹֽנִי׃ <S%H3644><s%> ka-Mo-ni. such

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, And Judah מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What נֹּאמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> no-Mar What shall we say לַֽאדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> la-do-Ni, behold we [are] my lord's מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What נְּדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> ne-dab-Ber answer וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> u-mah- What נִּצְטַדָּ֑ק <S%H6663><s%> nitz-tad-Dak; ;or how shall we clear ourselves הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, ;God מָצָא֙ <S%H4672><s%> ma-Tza hath found out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֲוֹ֣ן <S%H5771><s%> 'a-Von the iniquity עֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dei-cha, of thy servants הִנֶּנּ֤וּ <S%H2005><s%> hin-nen-Nu behold עֲבָדִים֙ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dim servants לַֽאדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> la-do-Ni, are my lord's גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- both we and [he] also אֲנַ֕חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Nach-nu we גַּ֛ם <S%H1571><s%> gam both אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whose נִמְצָ֥א <S%H4672><s%> nim-Tza is found הַגָּבִ֖יעַ <S%H1375><s%> hag-ga-Vi-a' the cup בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Do. possession

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said חָלִ֣ילָה <S%H2486><s%> cha-Li-lah God forbid לִּ֔י Li, מֵעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> me-'a-Sot that I should do זֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> Zot; so הָאִ֡ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish [but] the man אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whose נִמְצָ֨א <S%H4672><s%> nim-Tza is found הַגָּבִ֜יעַ <S%H1375><s%> hag-ga-Vi-a' the cup בְּיָד֗וֹ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Do, in whose hand ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he יִהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> yih-yeh- become לִּ֣י li עָ֔בֶד <S%H5650><s%> 'A-ved, he shall be my servant וְאַתֶּ֕ם <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tem you עֲל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lu and as for you get you up לְשָׁל֖וֹם <S%H7965><s%> le-sha-Lom in peace אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֲבִיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vi-Chem. unto your father פ Peh

וַיִּגַּ֨שׁ <S%H5066><s%> vai-yig-Gash came near אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav then יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, Then Judah וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mer unto him and said בִּ֣י <S%H994><s%> bi Oh אֲדֹנִי֒ <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Ni my lord יְדַבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-ber- I pray thee speak נָ֨א <S%H4994><s%> na please עַבְדְּךָ֤ <S%H5650><s%> 'av-de-Cha let thy servant דָבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> da-Var a word בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <S%H241><s%> be-'a-ze-Nei ears אֲדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Ni, in my lord's וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- nay יִ֥חַר <S%H2734><s%> Yi-char burn אַפְּךָ֖ <S%H639><s%> 'ap-pe-Cha and let not thine anger בְּעַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> be-'av-De-cha; against thy servant כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for כָמ֖וֹךָ <S%H3644><s%> cha-Mo-cha are equal כְּפַרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> ke-far-'Oh. for thou [art] even as Pharaoh
